channel.title: Cyberchef on Software and tech | Kristoffer Lorentsen

item.title: A couple of tools from my first CTF event
item.description: Attended my first CTF event yesterday, tghack for beginners. That introduced me to these nice tools: CyberChef - The Cyber Swiss Army Knife CTF crypto challenges pwntools - CTF framework and exploit development library for python Just used CyberChef to disquise a message. Can you figure out which album title is behind these zeros and ones? 01001011 01001100 01111011 01000001 01101110 01101111 01110100 01101000 01100101 01110010 00100000 01100010 01110010 01101001 01100011 01101011 00100000 01101001 01101110 00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101 00100000 01110111 01100001 01101100 01101100 01111101
